name: Fruit Blade
description:
Try this new game from Gc Gamers Club-Dev Aslan

You are a magic blade and want to collect shapes but while you're collecting 

it is raining bombs!!! Be careful and get the best high score.

I used  :- GDevelp's  example. I edit is and it is here!!!

Check out Our official website.

And check our game jam collection Our game jam collection website

  Finally Thanks to download our game don't forget to join our Telegram group, Discord server and share the game for some one else. 

And if you are bourde you can check out our all games.
